definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[תִּמְלָָךְ]] sq. acc. Le 2:13 (obj. offering).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְמֻלָּח]] Ex 30:35 salted, i.e. the incense (v. Di.)

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 fs. + Inf. abs. [[הָמְלֵחַ לאׁ הֻמְלַ֫חַתּ]] Ez Eze 16:4, i.e. rubbed or washed with salt (of infant, in personification).
